name: py-strawberryfields

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Open source library for continuous-variable quantum computation

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-numba
dependencies.description: NumPy aware dynamic Python compiler using LLVM

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-python-dateutil
dependencies.description: Extensions to the standard Python datetime module.

dependencies.name: py-quantum-blackbird
dependencies.description:
Blackbird is a quantum assembly language for continuous-variable quantum
computation, that can be used to program Xanadu’s quantum photonics
hardware and Strawberry Fields simulator.

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-sympy
dependencies.description: SymPy is a Python library for symbolic mathematics.

dependencies.name: py-thewalrus
dependencies.description:
A library for the calculation of hafnians, Hermite polynomials and
Gaussian boson sampling.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-urllib3
dependencies.description: HTTP library with thread-safe connection pooling, file post, and more.

dependencies.name: py-quantum-xir
dependencies.description: XIR is an intermediate representation language for quantum circuits.

dependencies.name: py-xanadu-cloud-client
dependencies.description:
The Xanadu Cloud Client (XCC) is a Python API and CLI for the Xanadu
Cloud.
